TrustInteroperabilityProfile.Name: Accountability through policy compliance and handling violations

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Accountability through provision of technical mechanisms for access
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Has technical means that enable user access to collected user data

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Accountability through provision of technical mechanisms for viewing data activity
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Has technical means enabling users to view all operations on their data

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Allow redress through correction of personal data
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Enables user correction of inaccurate collected data

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Mitigate Effects of Policy Non-adherence and Breaches
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Mitigates damages caused by data breaches or non-adherence to privacy policy

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Mitigate Data Binding on Relationship Termination
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Deletion of collected user data upon termination of user account

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Ensure Binding of Data to Policy under which Data was Collected
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Ensures site activity on collected data adheres to privacy policy under which it was collected

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Accountability through maintaining data provenance
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: Records origin from which data was collected
